title: Game crash
body: this is my first time writing this so not even sure anyone will read it but my game crashed in the middle of a ranked game, and when i tried logging in i was told that there were problems logging in because of the new patch, so if i lose ranked points will i be getting them back?

replies.body:
Welcome to the boards friend, though I'm sorry it's not under better circumstances.  :X  The issue you'r experiencing right now is a bit widespread, and we've got a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page on it.  The error seems to happen if you try to relog while in a game, but this workaround should fix it:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.
